message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $105.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
